titleStmt.title: An epitaphe vpon the death [of] Mayster Iohn Viron preacher
titleStmt.author: Awdelay, John, fl. 1559-1577.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdely, dwellyng in lytle Britayne streete by great Saint Bartelmewes,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Thou soule whych on Christes brest, doest rest as Iohn loued,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Mutilated, with loss of part of border and "of" in title.
